name: Pica
text: End of Your Turn (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) Set this character as active. Once Per Turn If this character would be K.O.d, you may instead rest up to one of your other 3 cost or more characters not named {Pica}

effect.text: You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) Set this character as active.
If this character would be K.O.d, you may instead rest up to one of your other 3 cost or more characters not named {Pica}
